full_summary:
# Request for Tender: Dredging Services for the Chockpish Basin

## Notice Issuance Details
- Reference Number: WS4257802603
- Solicitation Number: WS4257802603
- Publication Date: October 13, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: October 31, 2023 at 14:00:00
- Amendment Date: October 13, 2023

## Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal for dredging services for the Chockpish Basin in Chockpish, New Brunswick. The estimated value of this tender is between $100,001 and $500,000.

## Contract Details
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSC)
- End User: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
- Delivery Location: Chockpish Harbour, Côte de Ste. Anne, Kent County, NB
- Delivery Date: 9 weeks after award of contract

## Trade Agreements and Procurement Method
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Procurement Method: Competitive Tendering with Open Bidding

## Bid Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
- Bid Security: Required
- Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price

## Contact Information
- Contact Name: Gary Bryant, SPAC/PSPC
- Email: gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Documents
- Tender Notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17715777?extsite=MTc3MTU3NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==]
- Tender Attachment: Not Applicable

Note that only relevant information and details were included and only the most essential sections were preserved in this rewritten version. Non-relevant sections, typographical errors, and redundant information were ignored.
